lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : 拳头游戏音乐团队/Alex Seaver
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Alex Seaver/拳头游戏音乐团队
[00:11.611]What are you willing to lose
[00:13.117]You cover your wounds but underneath them
[00:17.380]A million voices in your head that whisper "Stop now"
[00:22.642]Another twist of the knife turn of the screws
[00:25.902]It's all in your mind and it's fighting you
[00:29.662]Arm yourself a storm is coming
[00:32.672]Well kid
[00:34.426]What you gonna do now
[00:39.942]It's your reflection looking back to pull you down
[00:45.963]So are you gonna die today or make it out alive
[00:51.228]You gotta conquer the monster in your head and then you'll fly
[00:55.787]Fly Phoenix fly
[00:59.549]It's time for a new empire
[01:02.308]Go bury your demons then tear down the ceiling
[01:07.824]Phoenix fly
[01:14.341]And now you're playing with matches come out of the ashes
[01:17.597]Underneath you a million voices in the crowd they're screaming "Stop now"
[01:25.365]Well let 'em swallow their pride you're turning the side to true believers
[01:31.384]Got them in the palm of your hand you're playing God now
[01:37.150]What you gonna do now
[01:42.915]It's your reflection looking back to pull you down
[01:48.934]So are you gonna die today or make it out alive
[01:54.198]You gotta conquer the monster in your head and then you'll fly
[01:59.211]Fly Phoenix fly
[02:02.471]It's time for a new empire
[02:04.977]Go bury your demons then tear down the ceiling
[02:10.747]Phoenix fly
[02:15.512]What you gonna do now
[02:20.274]What you gonna do now
[02:46.098]So are you gonna die today or make it out alive
[02:51.361]You gotta conquer the monster in your head and then you'll fly
[02:56.124]Fly Phoenix fly
[02:59.634]It's time for a new empire
[03:02.142]Go bury your demons then tear down the ceiling
[03:08.160]Phoenix fly
tlyric:
[00:11.611]你愿意付出什么
[00:13.117]累累伤痕 虽然被你遮掩
[00:17.380]但耳边有千万声的呢喃 快停下 别再向前
[00:22.642]如刀锋乱舞 渴望的极限
[00:25.902]纷杂的心念 等待你的决断
[00:29.662]握紧武器 风暴即将来临
[00:32.672]好的，孩子
[00:34.426]你要何去何从
[00:39.942]向前是涅槃向后是平庸
[00:45.963]今天你会一败不起 还是赢得一片天地
[00:51.228]征服你的杂念 飞向辉煌无限
[00:55.787]不死的火鸟 张开双翼
[00:59.549]开创新的王朝
[01:02.308]埋葬你的心魔 挣脱束缚的枷锁
[01:07.824]不死的火鸟 对世界的宣告
[01:14.341]火柴在你手中划过 沉寂的灰烬复燃
[01:17.597]灰烬之中 千万个声音在呼喊 快停下 别再向前
[01:25.365]让他们抛弃自己的骄傲 让世界见证你力挽狂澜
[01:31.384]命运在你股掌之间 仿佛天神下凡
[01:37.150]你要何去何从
[01:42.915]向前是涅槃向后是平庸
[01:48.934]今天你会一败不起 还是赢得一片天地
[01:54.198]征服你的杂念 飞向辉煌无限
[01:59.211]不死的火鸟 张开双翼
[02:02.471]开创新的王朝
[02:04.977]埋葬你的心魔 挣脱束缚的枷锁
[02:10.747]不死的火鸟 对世界的宣告
[02:15.512]你要何去何从
[02:20.274]你要何去何从
[02:46.098]今天你会一败不起 还是赢得一片天地
[02:51.361]征服你的杂念 飞向辉煌无限
[02:56.124]不死的火鸟 张开双翼
[02:59.634]开创新的王朝
[03:02.142]埋葬你的心魔 挣脱束缚的枷锁
[03:08.160]不死的火鸟 对世界的宣告
